title: Digital Fabrication Safety Culture Leadership Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of digital production facilities
context.additional_context: A practical competency enhancement program for managers/leaders to foster a safety culture

learning_goals: Learners can identify the three major risk factors (mechanical, chemical, electrical) in digital production environments and explain corresponding mitigation strategies.
Learners can design a communication framework for spreading a safety culture through collaborative activities and apply it in simulations.
Learners can practice safety accident prevention procedures using VR simulations and propose improvements incorporating evaluator feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
